962590.name: TYRED Demo
962590.description:
PLEASE NOTE: TYRED IS 2-4 PLAYER LOCAL MULTIPLAYER. A CONTROLLER PER PLAYER IS REQUIRED.

TYRED is a 2-4 player party game. Lead your tyre to victory in a series of minigames.

There are 3 Game Modes included in the Demo.

Bash
The aim of this game mode is to be the last tyre on the arena floor. Players must use everything in their power to knock their opponents off the edge of the podium.

Drop
Sidescrolling Mayhem. Players must move down a maze of elevating platforms. Hitting the floor or ceiling will result in a nasty puncture.

Wipeout
Man your post, and try to avoid getting swept away by the revolving arms.
